alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 3:04PM PST until March 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Interstate 5 near the Grapevine, a dusting to 1 inch of snow is expected. Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph at times will bring reduced visibilities due to blowing snow. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to reduced visibility in blowing snow and icy road conditions. Mountain roads, including Interstate 5 near the Grapevine could see travel delays or closures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will generally range between 3000 and 4500 feet through this evening, with minor snow accumulations also possible in the adjacent foothills of the Antelope Valley.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
